thread.title: Listen Live to Brockway/Ridgway and Karns City/Brookville (3A Title) Wednesday
thread.title_full: Listen Live to Brockway/Ridgway and Karns City/Brookville (3A Title) Wednesday

author: D9Sports
title: Listen Live to Brockway/Ridgway and Karns City/Brookville (3A Title) Wednesday
text:
CLARION, Pa. – Laurel Eye Clinic Hoops on exploreClarion.com and exploreJeffersonpa.com will feature a pair of District 9 boys’ basketball playoff games from Clarion University’s Tippin Gym Wednesday including the Class 3A title game between Karns City and Brookville. 
(Photo of Karns City’s Chandler Turner. Photo by Mike Schnelle. Check out more of Schnelle’s work here ) 
The night will start with the second D9 Class 2A semifinal contest between Ridgway and Brockway with tip set for 6 p.m. and the Kerle Tire Pre-game show at 5:30 p.m. The title game will follow at 7:30 p.m. Mike Kalinowski and Bob “The Governor” Dunkle have the call for both games with Chris Rossetti working the pre- and post-game. 
Fans can listen to the games live on exploreClarion.com or by downloading our app for Apple and Android . 
The following local sponsors have signed on to make KSAC Hoops possible:
